text: And you can begin right there. Well, the little boy is on a step stool trying to reach the cookie jar and it's falling. And the girl is reaching for a cookie he has in his hand. Mama's washing dishes and the sink's running over. It's just dry and a plate. sink is threaded over down on the floor. The window is up. And, is that all? You want something else? Well, there's a plate with two cups on the counter. Is that enough? That's good. I don't see it.
